subject: I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Ivan Puhich, 85, has been developing riders since 1944. His first involvement with a Triple Crown-winning horse, Citation, came four years later.
snippet: Ivan Puhich, 85, has been developing riders since 1944. His first involvement with a Triple Crown-winning horse, Citation, came four years later.
